Description.Text:
Position The Village is located in the heart of the Gargano National Park, overlooking the sea, with wide access ramp to the sandy and rocky beach south of Vieste, in the 'homonymous "Bay of Monaco" flanked by bays accessible from the sea.

More Informations The tourist village Bay of Monaco offers its guests a wide range of services including restaurant, bar, mini-market with staples, a swimming pool for children and adults with Jacuzzi area with access for adults only, multipurpose court tennis / football synthetic grass, playground for children, open parking, equipped with beach bar, toilets and shower. Club card includes: swimming pool with whirlpool, daytime use of sports equipment (night use fee), evening entertainment, mini club 6/12 years, beach with 1 umbrella and 2 beds apartment.
